description:
Cameron is a 21 year old construction worker, who says he doesn't function well without his daily work out, which consists of some jogging, and pumping iron.

When describing his ideal girlfriend, Cameron says he likes a girl with blonde hair, green eyes and a dusting of freckles. He said it's also important that she can party down and be comfortable giving him his space to enjoy time with his friends.

He goes on to tell us that he has no problem finding girls to 'kick it' with, but he's more interested in finding a genuine female to have a long-term relationship with now. We're sure Cameron will find his sweetie someday soon.

This is the second time Cameron's been on NextDoorMale, and this time he's a bit older and a bit more studlier.

Enjoy Cameron as he enjoys himself in the kitchen, on the bed, and on the sofa.
title: Cameron
